titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that receipt of additional disability compensation for dependents not depend upon the waiver of receipt of an equal amount of retired or retirement pay.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4836-4837)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 4/26/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' disability compensation provisions to provide that the receipt of additional compensation for dependents does not require the waiver of an equal amount of retired or retirement pay.
